resources.string: List of devices and their official maintainers
Show your support to Havoc-OS Team
Apps to not show when tapping on a Share button
Tap here to add, tap on added app to remove it

Press on color below to apply

Before Using OmniSwitch as Recent, enable the Service in Settings.

Toggles torch when power button is long pressed while display is off

Trigger back gesture on landscape from
Back gesture must start below this percentage of the screen

This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Display alarm as full screen instead of heads up
Leave the below values as is if you don\'t understand what they mean.

Prevent burn-in by shifting pixels every
Substratum detected! Please uninstall substratum before using this feature.
CAUTION: Attempting to restart SystemUI with Smart Pixels enabled will cause a black screen and a full reboot will be required to recover.
Touch status bar to toggle visibility
Hide charging information and unlock hints
Change the lock screen icon visibility
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Failed to uninstall, check root access
Allow unlocking device using fingerprint when screen is off or dozing
This will hide all immersive mode messages
Customize the bottom left and right shortcuts to your choice on lockscreen
Privacy status and Privacy guard per app
Play the notification sound of each app only once per set time period
Vibrate instead of playing a sound for in-call notifications
Pick which apps to exclude from the recents panel
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Display and customize weather on status bar
Display image and temp with scale
Display image and temp without scale
Notifications sound and vibration if screen is on
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area

Show circle app launcher after touching right side of screen
Apps will show in app circle bar
Swipe from the edge to enable/disable a pie that consists of cool shortcuts and navigation controls
Select the location where the Pie will be placed
Display the number of pending notifications
Apply a tint to the background based on the homescreen wallpaper
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
Customize the animations of each window in system
This is test for toast animation
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot without PIN/Password/Pattern\nNote: at your own risk!
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Animate when pulling down the statusbar
Disables transition animations such as when launching an app
Shows clock at the top while in immersive

Select to enable either smartbar or fling
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Unable to load image from content provider
Double-tap on the navbar empty areas to put device asleep
Allows swiping on the navigation bar to enable one handed mode
Use slim recents instead of the default recents view
View the settings for slim recents
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Are you sure you want to reset Slim Recents to stock settings?
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Exclude apps to be shown in the panel
Tap here to add app to the blacklist
Tap on the added app to remove it

To clear all apps, pinch-in with two fingers on the panel. To block an app from being cleared, long press on its icon to star it.\n\nFor additional recents features such as multiwindow or to kill an app, long press or drag an app card in the panel.
Change the view of the recents screen
Toggle statusbar icons with system tuner
Choose which app should be launched when tapping on the screenshot notification edit button
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
This will hide all force close notificaitons
Change the default font of the lockscreen City widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen Temp widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen Conditon widget
Send media play event after start
Do not start event on playback
App(s) to be listed when an A2DP event is triggered, such as connecting a Bluetooth headset
App(s) to be listed when a wired headset is connected
Ignore headset events if they are within threshold time
Disabling the camera shutter sound is illegal in some areas! Please check the applicable law in your country
Prevent loud volume levels when headset is first plugged in
Listening at high volume for long periods may damage your hearing. Disable it with caution.
Force apps that support expanded notifications
Adapt navbar color to match foreground running app
Toggle lock task icon in recent app view
Toggle dismiss task icon in recent app view
Allow accessing power menu on secure lock screen
Allow accessing quick settings and swipe shortcuts on secure lock screen
Pop-up usb mode chooser when device connected to PC
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
Vibrate device when device connected to power source
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Double tap left and right actions becomes left and right keyboard cursor actions if keyboard is open
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Used also as fallback for automatic color
Sync color with album arts. Overrides Lava Lamp and lines opacity.
Customize various durations of pixel animation on navbar
Customize various durations of pixel animation on navbar. WARNING! Changing default values can cause performance drop in animation.Proceed at your own risk
Show the music track title as the QS tile title
Display priority notifications in a small floating window
Disable heads-up notifications in these applications
Peeking notifications will show for defiend seconds
Disable heads up from these applications
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for defiened minutes
Launch music app on headset connection
When wired headset is plugged in
When BT headset (no carkit) is plugged in
When BT headset is plugged in
When wired or BT headset (no carkit) is plugged in
When wired or BT headset is plugged in
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on

When in editor mode, medium press and drag a button to change its position or long press a button to show the edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.\n\nSetting a double tap action will delay single tap a bit.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing or music is playing
Set how long the system will wait before triggering a longpress action
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Display 4G in signal icon instead LTE
Display charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put phone to sleep
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Double-tap on the status bar to put device asleep
Swipe fingerprint left or right to dismiss notifications
To dismiss your notifications, swipe left or right on the fingerprint sensor on the back of your phone.
Music track info in the Ambient Display
Toggle sound played while taking screenshot
Allow to use Home button when device is ringing
Button backlight brightness will adjust based on the screen's brightness level
Button backlight will only appear when buttons are pressed rather than on all the time. Timeout still impacts this feature.
Blur background settings for system UI
Blur the background when you pull down the status bar
Set the background of notifications translucent
Make the background of quick settings transparent
Blur the background of recent apps activity
Blur personalizations are disabled during keyguard view! Only translucent notifications are enabled!

These colors are the ones tinting the blur background. Instead of the normal grey, you can now choose the colors in the way you like. 
 There are three color filters: One used for light backgrounds, one used for dark backgrounds and one used for light/dark backgrounds. 
 So how are these colors working?? 
 Simple, as the titles say, the light filter will be used for lighter backgrounds, dark filter for dark backgrounds and the mixed filter one will be used for backgrounds not too dark but neither too light. 
 These colors are used for both BlurBackgrounds: StatusBar one and RecentsApps one
Blur personalizations are disabled during Keyguard view! Only Translucent Notifications are enabled!
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?
Drag selection on the area for screenshot via volume keys
Clear background process when using dismiss icon to dismiss task from recents view. This may lead unitentional results. Some apps may stop working until you restart them.
Change the date\'s visibility underneath the clock widget
Change the alarm text\'s visibility underneath the clock widget
Show a brightness icon beside the brighness slider to adjust auto-brightness
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down quick settings
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Display and customize battery bar near status bar or navigation bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Show notifications ticker-style in status bar
Display seconds next to clock in status bar
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Use same icon style as above in QS battery tile

Custom charging symbol near battery percentage text

Immersive recents setting is overridden if the expanded desktop is enabled.
For all changes to take effect, a SystemUI restart is required. Restart SystemUI now?
To add per app control, activate \'%1$s\' and press \'\u002b\' on the menu bar
